Isaiah or Isaias__10.22__A remnant of them shall be converted: This was partly verified in the children of Israel who remained after the devastations of the Assyrians, in the time of king Ezechiasand partly in the conversion of a remnant of the Jews to the faithful of Christ.-- Ibid.
Isaiah or Isaias__10.22__The consumption abridged: That is, the number of them cut short, and reduced to few, shall flourish in abundance of justice.
Isaiah or Isaias__10.27__At the presence of the oil: That is, by the sweet unction of divine mercy.
Isaiah or Isaias__10.28__Into Aiath: Here the prophet describes the march of the Assyrians under Sennacherib; and the terror they should carry with them; and how they should suddenly be destroyed.
